title: $383-billion rout! Why are Apple shares leading the US tech wreck?
text: The largest tech stocks that lifted the US market last year are having a chilly start to 2024. Apple, Amazon, Alphabet, Microsoft, Meta Platforms, and Tesla, among others, have slipped in all trading sessions so far this year. But it's Apple that has taken the biggest slice of this bad pie.
